name: workerscando-workers
description: 100 micro-tools powered by Cloudflare Workers - Backend APIs

scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:url-metadata && npm run deploy:og-image && npm run deploy:url-shortener
scripts.install:all: cd url-metadata && npm install && cd ../og-image && npm install && cd ../url-shortener && npm install
